channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cooling inflation numbers boost Trump's economic message
item.description: Consumer prices rose at a lower-than-expected rate last month, handing President Trump an early Christmas gift and a much-needed political boost headi...

item.title: House passes bill to de-list gray wolves as endangered species
item.description: Five years after gray wolves were last removed from the endangered species list, the House passed a bill to de-list the wolves again.

item.title: How Salient, an AI loan processing startup valued at $500 million, grew ARR to $25 million in two years
item.description: Salient cofounder Ari Malik built AI to automate loan servicing, turning collections calls into a high-growth business now valued around $500 million.

item.title: 201 House Democrats vote against blocking Medicaid dollars for kids' transgender surgeries
item.description: House Democrats largely opposed a bill banning Medicaid funding for transgender treatments for minors, with only four crossing party lines in the 215-...

item.title: Is Populism Popular?
item.description: As ever, ‘generic Republican’ is still the most potent political brand in America.

item.title: DC dinner turns chaotic as CODEPINK activists corner Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent: 'Blood on your hands'
item.description: CODEPINK protesters interrupted Scott Bessent’s dinner in Washington, accusing him of economic war crimes tied to U.S. sanctions. The secretary pushed...

item.title: Gov. J.B. Pritzker draws the line as the Bears flirt with an Indiana move
item.description: Illinois Gov. J.B. Pritzker's 2028 presidential ambitions are colliding with a very local headache: the Chicago Bears' stadium saga.

item.title: Lovable hits $6.6 billion valuation as its CEO says it wants to be ‘the last piece of software’ companies ever buy
item.description: The Swedish startup raised $330 million as enterprises race to adopt AI-built software.

item.title: You Can Say That Again
item.description: Embrace the latest lingo of the young, even if it seems silly.

item.title: Killing Of Nigerian Christians Underscores Islam Is Incompatible With Safety And Freedom
item.description: Nigeria is the epicenter of the fight for jihadist control and the imposition of sharia law over all of Africa.

item.title: Trump gives fed workers two more days off for the Christmas holiday
item.description: President Trump, who has long complained about too many federal holidays, is giving federal workers extra days off next week for the Christmas holiday...

item.title: Trump’s Hyperbolic Sales Pitch
item.description: If nothing else, Trump’s speech shows the White House realizes the political challenge it faces on the economy.

item.title: CEO of nuclear fusion firm Trump Media is merging with: High-velocity capital is critical to build quickly and efficiently. The concerns are secondary
item.description: The so-called merger of equals would make TAE Technologies the first publicly traded fusion energy developer.

item.title: A Wild West Christmas, Courtesy of Frederic Remington and Sid Richardson
item.description: Remington’s nocturnes are full of spiritual feeling. Plus, a visit to the Cowgirl Hall of Fame.

item.title: Vivek Ramaswamy Is Wrong About American Identity And Wrong About America
item.description: A disembodied notion of American identity means that America is really nothing at all, and no one is really an American.

item.title: The AI efficiency illusion: why cutting 1.1 million jobs will stifle, not scale, your strategy
item.description: The canary in the coal mine for the broader economy is the crisis facing Black women.

item.title: It’s Okay to Criticize Trump
item.description: Doing so will not somehow damage the ‘movement.’

item.title: ‘This is a wacky number’: economists cry foul as new government data assumes zero housing inflation in surprising November drop
item.description: The culprit, several economists say, is the extended government shutdown.

item.title: Employment Commission Makes Direct Appeal To White Males Facing Workplace Discrimination
item.description: The Trump administration's Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is launching an assault on DEI discrimination against white men.
